item.title: The World's Money: Expanding the Agenda for Research
item.description: Strnage, Susan. “The World’s Money: Expanding the Agenda for Research,” International Journal 36, no. 4 (1981): 691-712. After a survey of current modes of thought, both academic and practitioner, Strange concludes that while much analysis can usefully illuminate the mechanisms of the global monetary system, there is little attempt ally this to a consideration how the system links up with and effects the values of and outcomes in a globalised society.
